list.name: Netflix
list.description: The grand-daddy of streaming services, Netflix offers over 6000 titles including movies, TV shows and thousands of hours of quality original content. With an attractive, smooth interface and its rich feature offering, Netflix is one of the best cord-cutting services, guaranteed to keep you entertained.

pricing.misc: Stream content in SD. No simultaneous viewing
Stream  / download content in HD on 2 devices simultaneously
Mostly HD content, some 4K content. Stream / download content on 4 devices simultaneously

pros: Great experience. Simple and easy to use
Lots of categories to choose from
Create watch lists for up to 5 profiles and a separate kids section
cons: Content changes rapidly. Keeping up with what’s removed or added is a challenge
New content takes time to arrive on Netflix

features.name: 4K/UHD
features.description: Some content is available for streaming in 4K/UHD

features.name: Auto Play
features.description: Automatically continue watching the next episode or movie

features.name: Create Profiles
features.description: 5 profiles per account, keep recommendations and watch lists separate; separate kids section

features.name: Recommendations
features.description: Content is suggested based on previous viewing experience and/or user rating

features.name: Rate Content
features.description: Netflix lets you rate content using the thumbs up or thumbs down feature

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: As soon as you start watching, Netflix adds the content to the continue watching listing so that you can watch it later on the same or a different device

features.name: Viewing History
features.description: List of previously watched content

features.name: Offline Viewing
features.description: Download content offline for viewing without an internet connection

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Set a maturity level for a particular profile to control content available for that profile. Or set a 4-digit PIN that must be entered to play any content above a selected maturity level, on any profile

features.name: Categories
features.description: Netflix has a huge list of categories that go far beyond the usual Action, Comedy, Drama, Sci-Fi and the like. It also has a secret master list of categories that are even more specialized which can be accessed using codes at http://www.netflix.com/browse/genre/###

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: Create a customized collection of TV shows (MyList) and movies you want to watch as you browse Netflix's catalog

news.title: Dolby Atmos Coming to Netflix
news.article: Imagine watching your favorite TV show or movie without the sounds that truly moved you and made you feel the impact of each moment. In creating an immersive atmosphere, sound is just as important, if not more important, than the picture itself. It is a critical tool to extend the storytelling beyond the screen and draw audiences into the narrative. I’m pleased to announce the addition of Dolby Atmos® support on Netflix beginning with Okja, a critically praised film directed by Bong Joon Ho that recently debuted at the Cannes Film Festival, and is available globally on Netflix starting today.

list.name: Amazon Video
list.description: If you already have an Amazon Prime membership, Prime Video comes for free although not everything is available to watch free of charge. Some of the latest films can be bought or rented for a fee. It’s a good choice for binge-watchers, offering an impressive content library of more than 18,000 movies and 2,000 TV shows.
list.content: Movies, Shows, Originals, Documentaries, Sports, Add-ons

pricing.misc: Mostly HD content, some 4K content. Watch content on 2 devices simultaneously
All Standalone features, plus FREE Two-Day Shipping and other benefits
All Prime features for 1 year, 2 months free!

features.name: 4K/UHD
features.description: Some content is available for streaming in 4K/UHD

features.name: On-screen Movie Info
features.description: X-Ray feeds viewers a steady stream of info about the actors, filmmakers, music, and assorted trivia in each scene from IMDb, directly on screen

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Amazon Video parental controls work by requiring entry of your PIN to bypass any purchase or viewing restrictions you've enabled

features.name: Viewing History
features.description: List of previously watched content. Hidden under your Account page > Improve Your Recommendations > Videos you've watched

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: Continue watching content later on the same or a different devices

features.name: Auto Play
features.description: Auto Play gives you the option to automatically play episodes of a TV series back-to-back. It shows you the Next Up episode in a TV series at the end of the currently playing episode, while the credits roll

features.name: Offline Viewing
features.description: Only selected Prime Video titles are available to download and, the time period you have to view a downloaded title while your device is offline varies by title

features.name: Add-Ons
features.description: Add HBO, Showtime and Starz Channels channel (at an extra cost)

features.name: Categories
features.description: Most Popular, Top Rated, Recently Added, Originals, Trending, Exclusives, Genres, etc

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: Your Videos keeps track of shows/movies you haven't finished watching or have added to your Watchlist

news.title: Amazon Starts Streaming Shows The Next Day on Amazon Prime Video
news.article: For the first time in the United States, Amazon will start airing a TV show the next day after it airs as part of your Amazon Prime Membership. Starting in August Amazon Prime will air The Last Ship a TNT series the day after they air on TNT. (From the best of our knowledge this is the first time this has ever happened in the United States.) Hopefully, this is just the start of more shows coming to Amazon Prime the next day.

list.name: Hulu
list.description: Primarily oriented towards television series, Hulu also offers original content although at a slower rate than its main competitors. As of May, 2017, Hulu launched a live tv streaming service competing with OTT services like SlingTV and DirecTV Now.
list.content: Shows, Originals, Movies, Documentaries, Add-ons, Live TV

pricing.misc: No simultaneous viewing
No simultaneous viewing
No simultaneous viewing
50+ channels plus Hulu’s existing ad-supported streaming library
50+ channels plus Hulu’s existing no-commercial streaming library
Price is in addition to subscription plan
Price is in addition to subscription plan
Price is in addition to subscription plan

features.name: Next Day Streaming
features.description: Next-day streaming of ABC, Fox, and NBC Shows (TV)

features.name: Record Live TV
features.description: Record live TV, starting with 50 hours of storage (TV)

features.name: P/RW/FF
features.description: Pause, rewind, and fast-forward live TV (TV)

features.name: Create Profiles
features.description: Create up to 6 individual profiles, keep track of your favorites and personalize your Hulu experience (TV)

features.name: Categories
features.description: Choose from categories like Popular, Recently Added, Originals, Staff Picks, Exclusives, Genres, etc

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: My Stuff is your personal space for everything you want to keep track of – you control what goes here. It’s available on all devices with the new Hulu experience

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: You have to be at least 17 years old to view mature content. Parents can change the age on the account to under 17 if they want to continue to block content after their kids reach that age. There’s also Hulu Kids for Hulu Plus subscribers

features.name: Add-Ons
features.description: HBO, Showtime add-ons

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: Migrate your viewing experience seamlessly across devices: start watching on your phone, continue watching on your TV

news.title: Hulu Drops Price of Entry-Level Plan to $5.99 Monthly
news.article: Hulu is now offering its cheapest streaming plan, which includes commercials, for $5.99 / month for the first year through Jan. 9, 2018, only to new or returning Hulu subs — a short-term promotion aimed at luring new subs with the kickoff of the fall television and Hulu’s expanded TV library lineup.

news.title: Hulu Will Launch Support for Amazon’s Alexa This Fall
news.article: Once integration is complete, “You can ask your Alexa Voice Remote to find, launch, and control content on Hulu or pair your Fire TV to an Echo device to enjoy hands-free, far-field voice control to perform an array of actions on their TV including pause, rewind, fast-forward and start watching favorite titles and channels.

list.name: Crackle
list.description: Crackle offers full-length movies, TV shows and some original programming from loads of genres. Crackle also produced and distributed original programing including Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee, Chosen, Sports Jeopardy!, and full-length feature films Extraction and Joe Dirt 2

pricing.misc: Video resolutions cap out at 480p

features.name: Categories
features.description: On the web app, you can view all of their movies unsorted, or you can drill down by genre, length, or alphabetical order.

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: Queues allow you to organize your favorite videos in collections that you can even share with your friends. You can create multiple queues for all your interests.

list.name: Tubi TV
list.description: This free, ad-supported television and movie platform, holds one of the largest library of free TV and movies on the web (40,000+). Tubi TV offers a relatively limited selection of big-budget, well-received films and they also have some decent documentaries, foreign films, and indie films. Ads run for a few minutes at a time and will interrupt your viewing about once every ten minutes.

pricing.misc: Video resolutions cap out at 480p

features.name: Categories
features.description: Some categories are unique to TUBI, like Not on Netflix and Highly Rated on Rotten Tomatoes among others.

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: The service will remember where you left off streaming on your device but not when switching devices.

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Set up your parental controls to block certain content from appearing in your account.

features.name: Viewing History
features.description: You can view your history via your Account Settings on Tubi TV

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: You can create Queues of content to watch in the future.

list.name: HBO Now
list.description: A stand-alone, streaming-only service that gives you unlimited access to all of HBO's original programming plus hit movies, documentaries, sports, and exclusive comedy specials.
list.content: Originals, Movies, Shows, Documentaries, Sports, Music

pricing.misc: Watch content in HD on 3 devices at once
Watch content in HD on 3 devices at once

features.name: Onscreen Movie Info
features.description: Using a feature named Extras, HBO gives users access to cast and crew info and video extras (behind-scenes mini-docs, etc)

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Restrict what can be watched based on industry-standard movie and TV ratings. Once set, TV shows and movies with ratings above your limits can't be played. Kids Lock (for mobile devices) - keeps tiny fingers and eyeballs confined to the Kids section and makes search unavailable

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: When you watch a show or movie, HBO NOW keeps track of your progress. If you stop watching and then later play the same video, HBO NOW remembers your progress and starts playing where you left off

features.name: Categories
features.description: You can browse the categories of videos to find what you need. Some videos might appear in more than one category

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: A list of shows and movies that you've saved to watch at another time

news.title: Watch FREE for 1 month
news.article: Watch original series, hit movies, talk shows, news, and more. No TV package required. Free for 1 month, then $14.99/month. Cancel anytime. To start watching HBO, download the HBO NOW app on your favorite device. Learn more about HBO NOW

list.name: SHOWTIME
list.description: Launched in July, 2015 as a standalone offering, SHOWTIME offers a back catalog of episodes of various past and present Showtime original series, feature films, documentaries, sports events and analysis programs.

pricing.misc: Watch on 3 devices at once
Watch on 3 devices at once

features.name: Offline Viewing
features.description: Download full episodes and movies to your favorite mobile devices to watch offline later.

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: Play Shifting lets you resume watching where you left off on any device

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: To organize and easily keep track of your favorite programs while they are available for viewing on SHOWTIME, use My List.

news.title: Showtime Price Deals
news.article: If you already have Amazon Prime or subscribe to Hulu, then you can add Showtime as a premium channel. Showtime costs $8.99/mo on both Amazon Prime and Hulu. DIRECTV NOW has also launched Showtime, available as an add-on for $8/mo. This will include Showtime East and Showtime Video On Demand.

list.name: Starz
list.description: In 2016, Starz launched a standalone subscription service to compete with HBO Now, and Showtime. It started off with a library including network originals (Outlander and Power) and a slate of movies. Starz estimates that the app is booting up with about 1,600 series episodes and 850 movies.

pricing.misc: Watch content in HD on 4 devices at once

features.name: Offline Viewing
features.description: You can download select titles for watching later, without an internet connection. Titles downloaded will auto-delete after two weeks.

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: You can play, pause, and continue watching on any other device.

list.name: Shout! Factory TV
list.description: This channel offers a blend of full-length television shows, movies, specials, behind-the-scenes features as well as live streaming events and original content. It offers a stroll down memory lane for those of you who want to relive those TV shows and movies you loved, or at least watched, years ago.

pricing.misc: Highest quality video available for all titles
Ad-free as an Amazon Channel subscription

features.name: Channel Add-On
features.description: Available as an Amazon Channel subscription for $2.99/month, this service can actually be ad-free. To test it, sign-up for a free 7-day trial.

list.name: SnagFilms
list.description: SnagFilms is a free, ad-supported service showing over 5,000 movies, TV show episodes, unique indie films, exclusive original comedy shorts and lots of documentaries and independent films. There aren't a lot of advertisements although there’s no indication where they are placed within a video but, there are plenty of high-quality movies to stream in HD.

pricing.misc: Many programmes are available in 720p or 1080p

features.name: Categories
features.description: Genres include Award Winning, Korean Drama, Crime, African Movies, Documentary, Foreign, Biography, Faith & Spirituality, Celebrity, Sci-Fi, Drama, Kids & Family, Politics, Romance, Thrillers, and more.

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: Add movies to your queue to watch later

features.name: Recommendations
features.description: Recommendations to help choose movies you might be interested in and, there's also a section for new and popular movies so you can stay up to date with what others are watching.

list.name: ACORN tv
list.description: Although not very well known, ACORN tv streams world-class mysteries, dramas, comedies, movies and documentaries from Britain and beyond. Binge-watch a classic series or discover your new favorite show among dozens of programs available exclusively on Acorn TV.

pricing.misc: Many programmes are available in HD
Many programmes are available in HD

features.name: Categories
features.description: Navigate shows and movies by Genres or browse the current month's offerings, check out what's coming next month, and see what's leaving soon.

list.name: BritBox
list.description: The BBC and ITV have banded together to launch their own subscription streaming service in the US. BritBox claims to offer the "biggest" streaming collection of British TV shows from the two major British broadcasters for American viewers. The bulk of the shows fall under either the Drama or Comedy categories in which it excels in its selection.

pricing.misc: Many programmes are available in HD

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Any viewer who wants to watch a programme that is restricted will be asked to enter the PIN before they can watch.

list.name: CW Seed
list.description: This US free / ad-supported service claims to be the digital home for comedy, animation, and hundreds of hours of modern classics. It hosts a small collection of broadcast TV shows, such as V, Vixen, Constantine, and Whose Line Is It Anyway, plus some exclusive online-only material like JoJoHead and I Ship It but, almost no CW content (for that, go to cwtv.com).

pricing.misc: Many programmes are available in HD

features.name: Continue Watching
features.description: It’ll remember where you are in an episode, but not what episode you are on.

list.name: Funny Or Die
list.description: If you are the kind of person who loves to watch hilarious videos online every day then this service is a must. Currently one of the premier comedy services, Funny or Die hosts one-off videos, ongoing series and a rotating cast of celebrity guest stars, from Bill Nye to Jennifer Lawrence to Samuel L. Jackson.

pricing.misc: Many programmes are available in HD

features.name: Vote Based Ranking
features.description: Immortal Ranking - Unlike other viral video sites, members of Funny Or Die are encouraged to vote on videos which they view, with the options of Funny or Die. If the video receives an 80% or greater Funny rating after 100,000 views, it gets an Immortal ranking. If the video receives a 20% or less Funny rating after 1,000 views, it is relegated to the Crypt section of the site.

list.name: Popcorn Flix
list.description: The free, ad-supported service hosts full-length movies, documentaries, foreign films and some original content including web series (webisodes) and film school originals. The ads are pretty short and are running every 15 minutes or so. It’s also worth noting that Popcornflix offers a separate kid-friendly app called PopcornflixKids.

pricing.misc: Streaming is mostly SD

features.name: Categories
features.description: Within each genre, you can sort those films by most popular or by title. There's also a Most Popular and New Arrivals link in the menu that let you view all the popular and new movies regardless of the genre.

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Popcornflix offers a separate kid-friendly app called PopcornflixKids.

list.name: PBS Kids
list.description: This educational service designed for kids 4 and up, is the home base for all of PBS Kids’ offerings. The app features games, videos, and other activities that center on popular PBS live-action and animated show characters such as Curious George, Noah and Thomas. The colorful interface is easy for kids to use, with large buttons and pictures of their favorite characters.

pricing.misc: Streaming is mostly SD; One code can only be used once, and for one device.

features.name: Integrated Games
features.description: A unique feature enabling children to toggle between a PBS KIDS show and an activity that extends learning – all in one seamless digital experience. The live stream and games feature is grounded in research demonstrating that measurable gains in learning are achieved when children engage with PBS KIDS content on multiple platforms.

list.name: Vevo
list.description: Vevo is supposed to be kind of like Hulu television streaming, but for music videos (ad-supported). A more premium subscription product could be introduced in the future. Vevo has about 160000+ music videos, original series, behind-the-scenes footage, live performances interviews with artists and exclusive original programming.

pricing.misc: Streaming is mostly HD

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: You can watch videos in sets called playlists. Rather than clicking around one by one, you can load any Vevo playlist and enjoy watching multiple videos in a row. Finally, you can create and save your own personalized playlists.﻿

features.name: App Integration
features.description: Vevo can match the artists you have in your iTunes library with the ones that are stored in the Vevo library so that playlists can be created based on those matches.

list.name: MUBI
list.description: The streaming service Mubi introduces a new movie to its subscribers every day, which you have access to for 30 days. It also includes festival gems and hard-to-find masterpieces. MUBI is accessible in US, Australia, Canada, UK and many other countries on multiple devices.

pricing.misc: Watch on up to 5 devices, 2 screens at the same time

features.name: Offline Viewing
features.description: You can temporarily download our films via MUBI's Android and iOS mobile apps and keep them on your device for offline viewing

list.name: FANDOR
list.description: Similar in concept to Mubi.com, Fandor offers curated films for real movie buffs. It also lets you create movie lists and share them with friends. Its library includes film titles you'd be unlikely to find on Netflix, everything from silent-film classics to B-grade horror flicks.

pricing.misc: Some HD titles, Unlimitted Screens
Some HD titles, Unlimitted Screens
50% discount for students and educators

list.name: Seeso
list.description: Seeso is something of a unique service that offers only one genre. It has an ad-free extensive collection of hand-picked comedy comprised of hilarious, never-before-seen originals, quotable classics, next-day TV, hours of stand-up specials, bingeable library shows, and much more.

pricing.misc: 2 concurrent logins and unlimited concurrent streams

features.name: Parental Controls
features.description: Allow you to establish the maturity level of the content available in your account.

features.name: Auto Play
features.description: Keeps your playlist or the featured playlist running, one video after another

features.name: Watch Lists
features.description: Use The Playlist to have your selected videos play automatically every time that you access the site. You can add your own favorite episodes.

list.name: Shudder
list.description: Like Seeso, Shudder (an AMC product) is focused on delivering films of one genre only - Horror. It is devoted exclusively to things that go bump in the night offering 800 films+, a growing, ghoulish curated library of horror films from around the world and across the decades.

pricing.misc: Some HD Content. Available also as an Amazon Channel
Some HD Content

features.name: Categories
features.description: Shudder as numerous movie collections to choose from including a number of guest curators and their favorites.

list.name: Sling TV
list.description: Sling TV allows subscribers to watch a collection of live and on-demand TV channels on their TVs, computers or mobile devices. This is live TV, just like a cable or satellite TV service, except it's delivered over the internet, providing live channels including ESPN, AMC, TNT, CNN and Disney, as well as some on-demand content, at a fraction of a price compared to standard pay TV packages, with no contract or commitment.

pricing.misc: No simultaneous viewing
No ESPN channels. Watch content on 3 devices at once
Includes all the channles from Orange/Blue

features.name: Categories
features.description: Categories include On Now, Guide, Sports, Movies, etc

features.name: Cloud DVR
features.description: 50 hours of Cloud DVR storage for $5 per month. Record movies, episodes, full series and more.

features.name: Favorites
features.description: Customize your favorite channels on Sling TV and launch your favorite Netflix shows and movie using Air TV

features.name: Movie Rentals
features.description: Sling TV members get instant access to thousands of digital movies to rent, ranging from newest releases to your favorite classics! The price of our movie rentals generally range between $2.99 to $4.99 per movie. Some rentals are as low as $0.99, and many others are free to Sling TV subscribers!

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: This feature is offered under the Available Now name. The content and length of time it is available varies by channel. Sling TV offers the ability to replay content that has aired in the past three days on some of the channels.

list.name: DirecTV Now
list.description: AT&T's cable TV alternative is available to anyone across the US (and data-free for AT&T wireless customers). Following in the footsteps of Sling TV and PlayStation Vue, DirecTV Now is slightly more affordable for those who want to cut the cord by offering more channels at lower prices. Add-ons (like HBO, Cinemax, etc) are available at $5 each.

pricing.misc: ABC, Fox, NBC, most basic cable channels
Adds select regional sports networks, ESPN News, more
Adds NBA TV, NHL Network, FXM, Sundance TV, more
Adds 8 Starz/Encore channels, Boomerang, El Rey, more

features.name: Categories
features.description: There are Netflix-like categories to help you parse the movie/shows catalog.

features.name: Favorites
features.description: You can save DIRECTV NOW channels to a Favorites list. And build a Watchlist of up to 100 titles to watch later.

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: Did you miss your favorite show? Catch up on what you missed with 72 Hour Rewind. Also, choose from up to 20,000 shows and titles based on your DIRECTV NOW plan. On Demand content is updated constantly and many new shows are available within hours of when they air - subject to network availability.

features.name: Cloud DVR
features.description: Coming Soon!

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: Coming Soon!

list.name: PS™Vue
list.description: Sony's PlayStation Vuew is a live streaming TV service with sports, news, and your favorite must-watch shows. It includes premium channels, a powerful cloud DVR, streaming on up to five devices at once and no annual contracts. It's available nationwide in the US, but costs more (and offers live local channels) in seven major cities.

pricing.misc: ABC, Fox, NBC, ESPN, most basic cable channels
More sports networks, Sundance...and more
Adds BBC, even more sports channels...
Adds Premium Showtime, HBO channels

features.name: Categories
features.description: Some of the available cagetories are: TV Shows, Movies, Sports, News, etc.

features.name: Channel Guide
features.description: Use the channel guide to find what's on by the networks you know - no channel numbers to remember.

features.name: Cloud DVR
features.description: Capture hundreds of hours of programming so you never miss an episode. Tag your favorite shows; upcoming airings will be automatically saved to the cloud DVR.

features.name: Favorites
features.description: You can tag any channel to make it a favorite. Also, any show added to My Shows will be labeled as DVR.

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: You can pause Live TV for a 5 minute window. On some shows, you can rewind or fast forward. When using Live TV, shows/channels are sorted by their popularity at the moment.

features.name: Search
features.description: There are a few primary tools to find the content you're looking for, Explore, Search and Guide. Search by show name, or explore by category, genres and more.

features.name: Multi-View
features.description: You can choose up to three live programs to watch on the same screen.

list.name: YouTube TV
list.description: Google’s streaming service is a now available in select US cities, streaming as many as 40 channels. It does not require a contract or long-term commitment, comes with many of the same key channels available on other platforms, such as ABC, CBS, Fox, NBC, Comcast SportsNet, ESPN, Syfy and the Disney Channel. Add-ons such as Showtime and local news programming will also be available.

pricing.misc: ABC, Fox, NBC, CNBC, USA, ESPN and more

features.name: Add-Ons
features.description: Showtime for $11/mo and Fox Soccer Plus for $15/mo.

features.name: Categories
features.description: Browse networks to see programs available on different networks. Browse shows and movies by genre, like action, animation, or comedy.

features.name: Cloud DVR
features.description: No storage limits. Record all your shows simultaneously. Recording are kept for 9 months. You can typically fast forward through ads on recorded programs once they've aired on live TV.

features.name: Favorites
features.description: Adding a program to your library means that all current and upcoming airings will be recorded. Add your preferred teams to your library, and any games available in your area will be recorded across any of the networks they air on. For one-off events, like awards shows, simply add the event to your library.

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: Many networks provide recent episodes of shows, movies, and more on-demand. You typically cannot fast-forward through video on demand ads.

features.name: YouTube Videos
features.description: If you're a YouTube Red member, you won't see ads on any YouTube videos in YouTube TV. If you’re not a YouTube Red member, you will see ads on YouTube videos, which allows us to support the creators of those videos.

features.name: Search
features.description: You can search for shows, movies, sports teams, events, actors, genres, and networks.

list.name: Pluto TV
list.description: Pluto TV is one of the more unique OTT services available today. It’s a free ad-supported service, like Crackle, and it uses a live TV channel model, like Sling TV or PlayStation Vue. But Pluto TV’s channels are not familiar cable properties like the ones on Sling TV. Instead, they’re mostly curated 100+ channels assembled by Pluto TV employees from online videos and licensed content.

pricing.misc: CNBC, Sky News, Bloomberg, NASA TV, etc

features.name: Channel Guide
features.description: TV Guide lets you surf channels, giving you the same flip-through-channels experience usually provided by CableTV providers.

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: Pluto TV will expand its offering of live streaming channels to include a large library of on-demand movies and television shows. The launch of on-demand content comes after the company announced licensing deals with Lionsgate, MGM and Warner Bros.

list.name: CBS All Access
list.description: Primarily, the service provides subscribers with direct access to on-demand streaming of select CBS TV shows. There are more than 8,500 episodes available to stream like NCIS, The Young and the Restless and Madam Secretary! In addition, there is also a CBS live stream with this service for about 50% of US markets which is super useful for sports fans and other people who like to watch live TV.

pricing.misc: 2 simultaneous streams (measured across all content available on CBS All Access) at any time
2 simultaneous streams (measured across all content available on CBS All Access) at any time

features.name: Categories
features.description: On the Main Screen, you can select from CBS All Access, Shows and Live TV, all of which have subcategories to choose from.

features.name: Add-Ons
features.description: Showtime for $9/mo

features.name: VOD Content
features.description: Access 8500+ episodes of hit TV shows – live and on demand! Live TV is the ability to stream your local CBS station's programming (including NFL games!) in real time.

list.name: FuboTV
list.description: fuboTV is a sports-centric Internet TV streaming service with the world's most popular live sports and entertainment content. The service currently available in the US and Canada only, offers access to national and regional networks. On top of the 60+ subscription based channels, there are many other packages available at additional cost.

pricing.misc: One fuboTV subscription allows you to stream from two devices at a time
One fuboTV subscription allows you to stream from two devices at a time
One fuboTV subscription allows you to stream from two devices at a time

features.name: Categories
features.description: Main categories include Sports, Entertainement, Guide and My DVR. The Sports Category includes sub-categories by Sport like Soccer, Football, Basketball, etc.

features.name: Channel Guide
features.description: Mimics a traditional pay TV interface.

features.name: Cloud DVR
features.description: You can record any live programs on most channels either before or during the program’s airing. Your DVR becomes available 30 minutes after the live program ends and expires after 10 days. Your fuboTV subscription gives you up to 10 DVR slots at a time. This includes both recorded and scheduled DVRs.
